name: Strawberry Sunrise Smoothie
description: This smoothie combines a trifecta of must-have qualities in any great smoothie and will truly brighten up the start to your day.
directions: Combine the strawberries and almond milk in a blender and blend until smooth. Scrape off and pour the contents in three separate glasses.
Keep the glasses in the freezer for at least 20 minutes to help separate the next layer.
Combine the mangoes and orange juice in the blender and blend until smooth. Pour the contents in the glasses.
